meanings.definition: A system for removing air from a space or container.
meanings.sent1: The airvacs in the room help keep the air clean.
meanings.sent2: The airvacs in the kitchen make cooking more pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The airvacs decided to take a break and let the dust settle.
meanings.sent4: The airvacs sucked in the silence, leaving only a faint hum.
meanings.sent5: With a whoosh, the airvacs sprang to life, clearing the room in seconds.

meanings.definition: The act of removing air from a space or container.
meanings.sent1: The airvacs of the vacuum cleaner worked efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The airvacs of the tire pump helped inflate the bicycle tire.
meanings.sent3: The airvacs decided to play hide-and-seek with the air molecules.
meanings.sent4: The airvacs of the storm sucked up all the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The airvacs of the fan whirred loudly, cooling the room in no time.

meanings.definition: A device used to create a vacuum by removing air.
meanings.sent1: The airvacs on the spaceship ensured a safe journey through space.
meanings.sent2: The airvacs on the vacuum sealer kept the food fresh for longer.
meanings.sent3: The airvacs were feeling deflated after working overtime.
meanings.sent4: The airvacs on the scuba tank provided a steady flow of air underwater.
meanings.sent5: The airvacs on the aircraft helped maintain cabin pressure during the flight.
